#ifndef KEY_HPP
#define KEY_HPP

#include "gpio.h"

typedef struct {
    GPIO_TypeDef* GPIOx;
    uint16_t GPIO_Pin;
} KeyGPIO;

enum class LeftKeyState {
    KEY_DOWN = 0,
    KEY_UP   = 1,
    KEY_RIGHT= 2,
    KEY_LEFT = 3
};

enum class RightKeyState {
    KEY_DOWN = 0,
    KEY_LEFT = 1,
    KEY_RIGHT= 2,
    KEY_UP   = 3
};

class Key {
public:
    uint8_t m_leftKeyButton[4]  = {0}; // å·¦æ‰‹4é”®ï¼Œä½ç”µå¹³æŒ‰ä¸‹
    uint8_t m_rightKeyButton[4] = {0}; // å³æ‰‹4é”®ï¼Œä½ç”µå¹³æŒ‰ä¸‹
    KeyGPIO* m_rightInput = nullptr;
    KeyGPIO* m_leftInput  = nullptr;
public:
    Key(KeyGPIO* rightInput, KeyGPIO* leftInput)
        : m_rightInput(rightInput), m_leftInput(leftInput) {}
    ~Key() {};

    void init() {
        // å¼•è„šå·²åœ¨ MX_GPIO_Init é…ä¸ºä¸Šæ‹‰è¾“å…¥ï¼Œæ— éœ€é‡å¤é…ç½®
    }

    void scan() {
        for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
            m_rightKeyButton[i] = (HAL_GPIO_ReadPin(m_rightInput[i].GPIOx, m_rightInput[i].GPIO_Pin) == GPIO_PIN_RESET);
        }
        for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
            m_leftKeyButton[i]  = (HAL_GPIO_ReadPin(m_leftInput[i].GPIOx,  m_leftInput[i].GPIO_Pin)  == GPIO_PIN_RESET);
        }
    }
};

extern Key key;
#endif // KEY_HPP

void IRole::update(CollisionResult collisionResult) {
Â  Â  //åˆå§‹åŒ–
Â  Â  if (!m_pdata->initData.isInited) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  //é¦–æ¬¡åˆå§‹åŒ–
Â  Â  Â  Â  init();
Â  Â  Â  Â  return;
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  if (m_pdata->deathData.isDead) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  die();
Â  Â  Â  Â  return;
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  //ä½ç½®æ›´æ–°
Â  Â  if (!collisionResult.isCollision) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.currentPosX = m_pdata->spatialData.refPosX;
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.currentPosY = m_pdata->spatialData.refPosY;
Â  Â  } else {
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.refPosX = m_pdata->spatialData.currentPosX;
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.refPosY = m_pdata->spatialData.currentPosY;
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  //ç¢°æ’å¤„ç†
Â  Â  //ç¢°æ’å¤„ç†åœ¨ä½ç½®æ›´æ–°åè¿›è¡Œ
Â  Â  if (collisionResult.isCollision) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  //ç”¨æ¥é¿å…å•æ¬¡ç¢°æ’ä¸€æ¬¡é€€å›çš„æ— æ³•è§£å†³ç¢°æ’çš„é—®é¢˜
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.consecutiveCollisionCount++;
Â  Â  Â  Â  //ç¢°æ’åé€€å›
Â  Â  Â  Â  uint8_t backStep = 2*m_pdata->spatialData.consecutiveCollisionCount ;
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (m_pdata->identity == RoleIdentity::Player) backStep = 5*m_pdata->spatialData.consecutiveCollisionCount ;
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (collisionResult.direction == CollisionDirection::LEFT)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.refPosX = etl::max(m_pdata->spatialData.refPosX - backStep, 0);
Â  Â  Â  Â  else if (collisionResult.direction == CollisionDirection::RIGHT)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.refPosX =
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  etl::min(m_pdata->spatialData.refPosX + backStep, 128 - m_pdata->spatialData.sizeX);
Â  Â  Â  Â  else if (collisionResult.direction == CollisionDirection::UP)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.refPosY = etl::max(m_pdata->spatialData.refPosY - backStep, 0);
Â  Â  Â  Â  else if (collisionResult.direction == CollisionDirection::DOWN)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.refPosY =
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  etl::min(m_pdata->spatialData.refPosY + backStep, 64 - m_pdata->spatialData.sizeY);
Â  Â  } else {
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->spatialData.consecutiveCollisionCount = 0;
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  //å°„å‡»å†·å´å¤„ç†
Â  Â  if (m_pdata->attackData.shootCooldownTimer > 0) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  uint8_t shootCooldownSpeed = m_pdata->attackData.shootCooldownSpeed;
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (controlDelayTime * shootCooldownSpeed >= m_pdata->attackData.shootCooldownTimer)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->attackData.shootCooldownTimer = 0;
Â  Â  Â  Â  else
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->attackData.shootCooldownTimer -= controlDelayTime * shootCooldownSpeed;
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  //çƒ­é‡å†·å´å¤„ç†
Â  Â  if (m_pdata->heatData.currentHeat > 0) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->heatData.heatCoolDownTimer += controlDelayTime;
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (m_pdata->heatData.heatCoolDownTimer >= 200) //æ¯200msé™æ¸©ä¸€æ¬¡
Â  Â  Â  Â  {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  if (m_pdata->heatData.currentHeat <= m_pdata->heatData.heatCoolDownRate)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->heatData.currentHeat = 0;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  else
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->heatData.currentHeat -= m_pdata->heatData.heatCoolDownRate;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->heatData.heatCoolDownTimer = 0;
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  //å›è¡€å¤„ç†
Â  Â  if (m_pdata->healthData.currentHealth < m_pdata->healthData.maxHealth) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->healthData.healTimeCounter += controlDelayTime * m_pdata->healthData.healSpeed;
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (m_pdata->healthData.healTimeCounter >= m_pdata->healthData.healResetTime) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  if (m_pdata->healthData.currentHealth + m_pdata->healthData.healValue >= m_pdata->healthData.maxHealth)
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->healthData.currentHealth = m_pdata->healthData.maxHealth;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  else
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->healthData.currentHealth += m_pdata->healthData.healValue;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->healthData.healTimeCounter = 0;
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  //æ£€æŸ¥è¡€é‡çŠ¶æ€
Â  Â  if (m_pdata->healthData.currentHealth == 0 && !m_pdata->deathData.isDead) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_pdata->deathData.isDead = true;
Â  Â  }
}

// ç®¡ç†æ¸¸æˆä¸­çš„Perkå¡ç‰‡ç³»ç»Ÿ
// å¼•ç”¨GameEntityManagerå®ä¾‹
// å½’gameProgressManagerç®¡ç†
extern GameEntityManager g_entityManager;

class GamePerkCardManager {
public:
Â  Â  GamePerkCardManager() Â = default;
Â  Â  ~GamePerkCardManager() = default;
Â  Â  GamePerkCardManager(const GamePerkCardManager &) Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â = delete;
Â  Â  GamePerkCardManager &operator=(const GamePerkCardManager &) = delete;

private:
Â  Â  static const uint8_t MAX_CARD_COUNT Â  Â  Â  = 22; // æ€»å¡ç‰‡æ•°ï¼ˆ2*10 +1*2=22ï¼‰
Â  Â  static const uint8_t SELECTION_SLOT_COUNT = 3; Â // é€‰å¡æ§½æ•°é‡ï¼ˆ3å¼ ï¼‰
Â  Â  etl::vector<PerkCard, MAX_CARD_COUNT> Â  Â  Â  m_cardWarehouse; Â // å¡ç‰‡ä»“åº“ï¼ˆå­˜æ‰€æœ‰å¡ç‰‡ï¼‰
Â  Â  etl::vector<PerkCard, SELECTION_SLOT_COUNT> m_selectionSlots; // é€‰å¡æ§½ï¼ˆä¸´æ—¶å­˜3å¼ å¾…é€‰ï¼‰

public:
Â  Â  bool Â  Â isInited Â  Â  Â  Â = false; // æ˜¯å¦å·²åˆå§‹åŒ–
Â  Â  bool Â  Â m_isSelecting Â  = false; // é€‰å¡çŠ¶æ€ï¼ˆæ ‡è®°æ˜¯å¦å¤„äºâ€œé€‰å¡ä¸­â€ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤è§¦å‘ï¼‰
Â  Â  uint8_t m_selectedIndex = 0; Â  Â  // é€‰ä¸­å¡ç‰‡ç´¢å¼•ï¼ˆé€‰å¡æ§½å†…ç´¢å¼•ï¼‰
Â  Â  uint8_t m_selectedSize Â = 0; Â  Â  // é€‰ä¸­å¡ç‰‡æ•°é‡ï¼ˆé€‰å¡æ§½å†…æ•°é‡ï¼‰
public:
Â  Â  // åˆå§‹åŒ–å¡ç‰‡ä»“åº“
Â  Â  void initWarehouse() {
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_cardWarehouse.clear();
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_selectionSlots.clear();
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_isSelecting = false;
Â  Â  Â  Â  isInited Â  Â  Â = true;
Â  Â  Â  Â  // éå†é…ç½®è¡¨ï¼ŒæŒ‰æ•°é‡åˆ›å»ºå¡ç‰‡å¹¶åŠ å…¥ä»“åº“
Â  Â  Â  Â  for (const auto &config : PERK_CARD_CONFIGS) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < config.count; ++i) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  PerkCard newCard(config.type, config.name, config.param);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_cardWarehouse.push_back(newCard);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  }

Â  Â  bool triggerPerkSelection() {
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (m_isSelecting || m_cardWarehouse.empty()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  return false; // å·²åœ¨é€‰å¡ä¸­æˆ–æ— å¡ç‰‡å¯é€‰ï¼Œæ‹’ç»è§¦å‘
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_selectionSlots.clear();
Â  Â  Â  Â  // å¯ç”¨å¡ç‰‡ä¸è¶³3å¼ æ—¶ï¼Œå–å…¨éƒ¨ï¼ˆé¿å…é€‰å¡æ§½ä¸ºç©ºï¼‰
Â  Â  Â  Â  uint8_t selectCount = etl::min(SELECTION_SLOT_COUNT, (uint8_t)m_cardWarehouse.size());
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (selectCount == 0) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  return false; // æ— å¯ç”¨å¡ç‰‡
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_selectedSize = selectCount;
Â  Â  Â  Â  // éšæœºæŠ½å–selectCountå¼ å¡ç‰‡ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥é€‰å¡æ§½ï¼ˆä»ä»“åº“ç§»é™¤ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤æŠ½ï¼‰
Â  Â  Â  Â  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < selectCount; ++i) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // åµŒå…¥å¼éšæœºç®—æ³•ï¼šç”¨ç³»ç»Ÿæ»´ç­”å®šæ—¶å™¨åšæ¨¡è¿ç®—ï¼ˆæ— éœ€rand()ï¼‰
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  uint8_t randIdx Â  Â  Â = rand() % m_cardWarehouse.size();
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  uint8_t warehouseIdx = randIdx;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // ä»ä»“åº“ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°é€‰å¡æ§½ï¼ˆé¿å…æ‹·è´ï¼Œæå‡æ•ˆç‡ï¼‰
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â m_selectionSlots.push_back(m_cardWarehouse[warehouseIdx]);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_cardWarehouse.erase(m_cardWarehouse.begin() + warehouseIdx);
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ ‡è®°ä¸ºé€‰å¡ä¸­ï¼ŒUIæç¤º
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_isSelecting = true;
Â  Â  Â  Â  return true;
Â  Â  }

  

Â  Â  bool selectCard(uint8_t slotIndex) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  // å‰ç½®æ ¡éªŒï¼š1. åœ¨é€‰å¡ä¸­ï¼›2. æ§½ç´¢å¼•æœ‰æ•ˆ
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (!m_isSelecting || slotIndex >= m_selectionSlots.size()) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  return false;
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  // å¤„ç†é€‰ä¸­å¡ç‰‡ï¼ˆslotIndexï¼‰
Â  Â  Â  Â  PerkCard Â  Â  selectedCard = m_selectionSlots[slotIndex];
Â  Â  Â  Â  LeadingRole *player Â  Â  Â  = (LeadingRole *)g_entityManager.getPlayerRole();
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (player == nullptr) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  return false; // æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ç©å®¶è§’è‰²ï¼Œæ— æ³•åº”ç”¨å¡ç‰‡æ•ˆæœ
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  // åº”ç”¨å¡ç‰‡æ•ˆæœ
Â  Â  Â  Â  switch (selectedCard.type) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::HEAL_SPEED_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->healthData.healSpeed += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::HEAL_AMOUNT_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->healthData.healValue += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::HEALTH_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->healthData.maxHealth += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->healthData.currentHealth = player->getData()->healthData.maxHealth;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::ATTACK_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->attackData.attackPower += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::ATTACK_SPEED_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->attackData.shootCooldownSpeed += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::HEAT_CAPACITY_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->heatData.maxHeat += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::HEAT_COOL_DOWN_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->heatData.heatCoolDownRate += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::UNLOCK_FIREBALL:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->bulletTypeOwned.fireBallBulletOwed = 1;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::UNLOCK_LIGHTNING:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->bulletTypeOwned.lightningLineBulletOwed = 1;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::FIREBALL_RANGE_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->attackData.bulletRange += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::LIGHTNING_MULTIPLIER_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->attackData.bulletDamageMultiplier += (static_cast<float>(selectedCard.param) / 10.0f);
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  case PerkCardType::MOVE_SPEED_UP:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  player->getData()->spatialData.moveSpeed += selectedCard.param;
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  default:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  // ç§»é™¤é€‰ä¸­å¡ç‰‡ï¼Œæ¸…ç†æœªé€‰ä¸­å¡ç‰‡ï¼Œé‡ç½®é€‰å¡çŠ¶æ€
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_selectionSlots.erase(m_selectionSlots.begin() + slotIndex);
Â  Â  Â  Â  returnUnselectedCards();
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_isSelecting = false;
Â  Â  Â  Â  return true;
Â  Â  }

Â  Â  // è¾…åŠ©æ¥å£ï¼šæœªé€‰ä¸­çš„å¡ç‰‡å›åº“
Â  Â  void returnUnselectedCards() {
Â  Â  Â  Â  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < m_selectionSlots.size(); ++i) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // è·³è¿‡é€‰ä¸­çš„å¡ç‰‡ï¼ˆslotIndexå·²å¤„ç†ï¼‰
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  m_cardWarehouse.push_back(m_selectionSlots[i]);
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  m_selectionSlots.clear();
Â  Â  }

Â  Â  void drawSelectionUI() {
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (!m_isSelecting) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  return; // éé€‰å¡çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œæ— éœ€ç»˜åˆ¶
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  // ç»˜åˆ¶é€‰å¡æ§½UIï¼ˆç®€åŒ–ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œå®é™…æ ¹æ®UIæ¡†æ¶å®ç°ï¼‰
Â  Â  Â  Â  for (uint8_t i = 0; i < m_selectionSlots.size(); ++i) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  OLED_PrintString(10, 10 + (i * 20), m_selectionSlots[i].name, &font8x6, OLED_COLOR_NORMAL);
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  Â  Â  OLED_DrawCircle(5, 12 + (m_selectedIndex * 20), 2, OLED_COLOR_NORMAL); // ç»˜åˆ¶é€‰ä¸­æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨
Â  Â  }
};

#endif // GAMEPERKCARDMANAGER_HPP

Â  uint32_t TxMailbox;
Â  CAN_TxHeaderTypeDef CAN_TxHeader;
Â  // è®¾ç½®å‘é€å‚æ•°
Â  CAN_TxHeader.StdId = 0x200; Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ ‡å‡†æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦(12bit)
Â  //CAN_TxHeader.ExtId = 0x00; Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ‰©å±•æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦(29bit)
Â  CAN_TxHeader.IDE = CAN_ID_STD; Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // ä½¿ç”¨æ ‡å‡†å¸§
Â  CAN_TxHeader.RTR = CAN_RTR_DATA; Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ•°æ®å¸§
Â  CAN_TxHeader.DLC = 0x08; Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // å‘é€é•¿åº¦ Â  Â  Â 
Â  CAN_TxHeader.TransmitGlobalTime = DISABLE;//å…³é—­cançš„æ—¶é—´è§¦å‘é€šä¿¡æ¨¡å¼
Â  // è£…è½½æ•°æ®
Â  memset(message, 0, sizeof(message));
Â  message[0] = (output >> 8) & 0xFF;
Â  message[1] = output & 0xFF;
Â  // å‘é€CANæ¶ˆæ¯
Â  if(HAL_CAN_AddTxMessage(&hcan1, &CAN_TxHeader, message, &TxMailbox) != HAL_OK)
Â  {
Â  Â  return 0;
Â  }

}

Â  if(hcan==&hcan1) // åªå¤„ç†CAN1
Â  {
Â  Â  // å¤„ç†CAN1æ¥æ”¶åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®
Â  Â  switch (CAN_RxHeader.StdId) // æ ‡å‡†æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦
Â  Â  {

Â  Â  Â  Â  // å¤„ç†IDä¸º0x201çš„æ¶ˆæ¯
Â  Â  Â  Â  test_motor.motor_raw_angle = (RxData[0] << 8) | RxData[1];
Â  Â  Â  Â  test_motor.motor_angle = (float)test_motor.motor_raw_angle/8191.f*360.f;
Â  Â  Â  Â  test_motor.motor_speed = (RxData[2] << 8) | RxData[3];
Â  Â  Â  Â  test_motor.motor_current = (RxData[4] << 8) | RxData[5];

Â  Â  Â  Â  break;
Â  Â  }
Â  }
}

class Deep {
public:
    int* data;
    
    Deep(int d) {
        data = new int(d);
    }
    
    // è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‹·è´æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆæ·±æ‹·è´ï¼‰
    Deep(const Deep& other) {
        data = new int(*other.data);  // å…³é”®ï¼šåˆ†é…æ–°å†…å­˜å¹¶å¤åˆ¶å€¼
    }
    
    // æ·±æ‹·è´èµ‹å€¼è¿ç®—ç¬¦
    Deep& operator=(const Deep& other) {
        if (this != &other) {  // é˜²æ­¢è‡ªèµ‹å€¼
            delete data;              // é‡Šæ”¾åŸæœ‰èµ„æº
            data = new int(*other.data);  // åˆ›å»ºæ–°å‰¯æœ¬
        }
        return *this;
    }
    
    ~Deep() { delete data; }
};

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹

Deep obj2 = obj1;  // æ·±æ‹·è´ï¼šobj2 æ‹¥æœ‰ç‹¬ç«‹çš„å†…å­˜å‰¯æœ¬

*obj1.data = 20;   // ä¿®æ”¹ obj1

#includeÂ <iostream>

using namespaceÂ std;
classÂ ClassA {
public:
	ClassA() {}
	ClassA(const char* pszInputStr) {
		pszTestStr =Â new char[strlen(pszInputStr) + 1];
		strncpy(pszTestStr, pszInputStr, strlen(pszInputStr) + 1);
	}

	virtualÂ ~ClassA() {
		deleteÂ pszTestStr;
	}

	// èµ‹å€¼è¿ç®—ç¬¦é‡è½½å‡½æ•°
	ClassA&Â operator=(constÂ ClassA& cls) {

		// é¿å…å†…å­˜æ³„éœ²

				deleteÂ pszTestStr;
				pszTestStr = NULL;
			}
		pszTestStr =Â new char[strlen(cls.pszTestStr) + 1];
		strncpy(pszTestStr, cls.pszTestStr, strlen(cls.pszTestStr) + 1);
		}
		returnÂ *this;
	}
public:
	char* pszTestStr;
};

intÂ main() {
	ClassA obj1("liitdar");
	ClassA obj2;
	obj2 = obj1;

	returnÂ 0;
}

template<typename T, int Size>
class Array {
private:
    T data[Size];
public:
    Array() {}
    
    T& operator[](int index) {

};

// 2. ç±»æ¨¡æ¿ç‰¹åŒ–ï¼ˆé’ˆå¯¹boolç±»å‹ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼‰
template<int Size>
class Array<bool, Size> {
private:
    unsigned char data[(Size + 7) / 8];  // ä½å‹ç¼©å­˜å‚¨
public:
    bool get(int index) const {
        return (data[index / 8] >> (index % 8)) & 1;
    }
};

#includeÂ <iostream>
#includeÂ <string.h>
using namespaceÂ std;
classÂ ClassA {
public:
	ClassA() {}
	ClassA(const char* pszInputStr) {
		pszTestStr =Â new char[strlen(pszInputStr) + 1];
		strncpy(pszTestStr, pszInputStr, strlen(pszInputStr) + 1);
	}

	virtualÂ ~ClassA() {
		deleteÂ pszTestStr;
	}

	// èµ‹å€¼è¿ç®—ç¬¦é‡è½½å‡½æ•°
	ClassA&Â operator=(constÂ ClassA& cls) {
		// é¿å…è‡ªèµ‹å€¼
		ifÂ (thisÂ != &cls) {
		// é¿å…å†…å­˜æ³„éœ²
			ifÂ (pszTestStr != NULL) {
				deleteÂ pszTestStr;
				pszTestStr = NULL;
			}
		pszTestStr =Â new char[strlen(cls.pszTestStr) + 1];
		strncpy(pszTestStr, cls.pszTestStr, strlen(cls.pszTestStr) + 1);
		}
		returnÂ *this;
	}
public:
	char* pszTestStr;
};

intÂ main() {
	ClassA obj1("liitdar");
	ClassA obj2;
	obj2 = obj1;
	cout <<Â "obj2.pszTestStr is: "Â << obj2.pszTestStr << endl;
	returnÂ 0;
}

template<typename T>
class Mat {
	uint16_t rows ;
	uint16_t clos ;
	T* data ;
	public :
		Mat(uint16_t rows,uint16_t cols):rows(rows),cols(cols) {
			data = new T[rows*cols]{};
		}
		~Mat() {
			delete [] data;
		}
		T getElement(uint16_t r , uint16_t c);//å‡½æ•°æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œç±»å†…å£°æ˜
		bool setElement(uint16_t r , uint16_t c , T value);//å‡½æ•°æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œç±»å†…å£°æ˜
};

//ç±»å†…å‡½æ•°æ¨¡æ¿çš„ç±»å¤–å®šä¹‰
template <typename T>
T Mat<T>::getElement(uint16_t r , uint16_t c) {//getElementæ˜¯Mat<T>çš„æˆå‘˜å‡½æ•°
	if( r >= this->rows || c >= this->cols ) {
		cout  << "getElement():Indices are out of range" << endl ;
		return 0 ;
	}
	return data[this->cols*r+c];
}

template <typename T>
T Mat<T>::setElement(uint16_t r , uint16_t c , T value) {
	if( r >= this->rows || c >= this->cols ) {
		cout  << "setElement():Indices are out of range" << endl ;
		return false ;
	}
	data[this->cols*r+c]=value;
	return true ;
}


//æ˜¾å¼å®ä¾‹åŒ–
template class Mat<int>;

void swap(int& x, int& y)
{

   return;
}

#include <iostream> 
using namespace std;
 
class Shape {
   protected:
      int width, height;
   public:
      Shape( int a=0, int b=0)
      {
         width = a;
         height = b;
      }
      int area()
      {
         cout << "Parent class area :" <<endl;
         return 0;
      }
};
class Rectangle: public Shape{
   public:
      Rectangle( int a=0, int b=0):Shape(a, b) { }
      int area ()
      { 
         cout << "Rectangle class area :" <<endl;
         return (width * height); 
      }
};
class Triangle: public Shape{
   public:
      Triangle( int a=0, int b=0):Shape(a, b) { }
      int area ()
      { 
         cout << "Triangle class area :" <<endl;
         return (width * height / 2); 
      }
};
// ç¨‹åºçš„ä¸»å‡½æ•°
int main( )
{
   Shape *shape;
   Rectangle rec(10,7);
   Triangle  tri(10,5);// å­˜å‚¨çŸ©å½¢çš„åœ°å€
   shape = &rec;// è°ƒç”¨çŸ©å½¢çš„æ±‚é¢ç§¯å‡½æ•° area
   shape->area();// å­˜å‚¨ä¸‰è§’å½¢çš„åœ°å€
   shape = &tri;// è°ƒç”¨ä¸‰è§’å½¢çš„æ±‚é¢ç§¯å‡½æ•° area
   shape->area();
   return 0;
}

class complex {
Â  Â  public:
Â  Â  Â  Â  complex();//é»˜è®¤æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
Â  Â  Â  Â  complex(double,double);//åˆå§‹åŒ–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°

Â  Â  Â  Â  complex operator + (complex);//è¿ç®—ç¬¦é‡è½½
Â  Â  Â  Â  complex operator - (complex);//è¿ç®—ç¬¦é‡è½½
Â  Â  Â  Â  friend istream& operator >> (istream& , complex&);//istreamç±»>>è¿ç®—ç¬¦é‡è½½
Â  Â  Â  Â  friend ostream& operator << (ostream& , complex&);//ostreamç±»<<è¿ç®—ç¬¦é‡è½½
Â  Â  private:
Â  Â  Â  Â  double real , imag ;
};
//æˆå‘˜å‡½æ•°çš„ç±»å¤–å®ç°
complex::complex() {
Â  Â  real = 0 ;imag = 0 ;
}
  
complex::complex(double r , double i ) {
Â  Â  real = r ; imag = i ;
}
  
complex::complex(double r ) {
Â  Â  real = r ; imag = 0 ;
}
  
complex complex::operator + (const complex c1) {
Â  Â  complex c2 ;
Â  Â  c2.real = real+c1.real ;
Â  Â  c2.imag = imag+c1.imag ;
Â  Â  return c2 ;
}
  
complex complex::operator - (const complex c1) {
Â  Â  complex c2 ;
Â  Â  c2.real = real-c1.real ;
Â  Â  c2.imag = imag-c1.imag ;
Â  Â  return c2 ;
}
//å‹å…ƒå‡½æ•°çš„å®ç°
//å®ç°iostreamç±»çš„è¿ç®—ç¬¦é‡è½½
istream& operator >> (istream& input , complex&c ) {
Â  Â  input >> c.real >> c.imag ;
Â  Â  return input ;
}
  
ostream& operator << (ostream& output , complex&c ) {
Â  Â  output << c.real << '+' << c.imag << 'i' << endl ;
Â  Â  return output ;
}

class Deep {

    Deep(const Deep& other) {

    }
    
    // æ·±æ‹·è´èµ‹å€¼è¿ç®—ç¬¦
    Deep& operator=(const Deep& other) {

            delete data;              // é‡Šæ”¾åŸæœ‰èµ„æº
            data = new int(*other.data);  // åˆ›å»ºæ–°å‰¯æœ¬

    ~Deep() { delete data; }
};

  while (1)

}

int main(void)
{
  /* USER CODE BEGIN 1 */
  /* USER CODE END 1 */
  /* MCU Configuration--------------------------------------------------------*/
  /* Reset of all peripherals, Initializes the Flash interface and the Systick. */
  HAL_Init();
  /* USER CODE BEGIN Init */
  /* USER CODE END Init */
  /* Configure the system clock */
  SystemClock_Config();
  /* USER CODE BEGIN SysInit */
  /* USER CODE END SysInit */
  /* Initialize all configured peripherals */
  MX_GPIO_Init();
  MX_TIM1_Init();
  /* USER CODE BEGIN 2 */
  HAL_TIM_PWM_Start(&htim1,TIM_CHANNEL_1);
  /* USER CODE END 2 */
  /* Infinite loop */
  /* USER CODE BEGIN WHILE */
  while (1)
  {
		for( int i = 0 ; i < 1000 ; ++ i ) {
			__HAL_TIM_SET_COMPARE(&htim1,TIM_CHANNEL_1,i);
			HAL_Delay(0);
		}
		for( int i = 1000-1 ; i >= 0 ; -- i ) {
			__HAL_TIM_SET_COMPARE(&htim1,TIM_CHANNEL_1,i);
			HAL_Delay(0);
		}
    /* USER CODE END WHILE */
    /* USER CODE BEGIN 3 */
  }
  /* USER CODE END 3 */
}

int lastTick = 0 ;
void HAL_GPIO_EXTI_Callback(uint16_t GPIO_Pin) {//å¤–éƒ¨ä¸­æ–­å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
	if( GPIO_Pin == GPIO_PIN_5 ) {
		if( HAL_GetTick()-lastTick > 150 ) {
			HAL_GPIO_TogglePin(GPIOA, GPIO_PIN_2);
			lastTick = HAL_GetTick();
		}
	}
}

void HAL_TIM_PeriodElapsedCallback(TIM_HandleTypeDef *htim) {
	if( htim == &htim1 ) {
		HAL_GPIO_TogglePin(GPIOA,GPIO_PIN_2);
	}
}

}

HAL_StatusTypeDef HAL_UART_Transmit_DMA(UART_HandleTypeDef *huart, const uint8_t *pData, uint16_t Size)  
{  
	  .
	  .
	  .
    /* Set the UART DMA transfer complete callback */  
    huart->hdmatx->XferCpltCallback = UART_DMATransmitCplt;  
  
    /* Set the UART DMA Half transfer complete callback */  
    huart->hdmatx->XferHalfCpltCallback = UART_DMATxHalfCplt;  
  
    /* Set the DMA error callback */  
    huart->hdmatx->XferErrorCallback = UART_DMAError; 
	  .
	  .
	  .
  }

void HAL_DMA_IRQHandler(DMA_HandleTypeDef *hdma)
{

  /* Half Transfer Complete Interrupt management ******************************/

  {
   ......

    {

      hdma->XferHalfCpltCallback(hdma);
    }

static void UART_DMARxHalfCplt(DMA_HandleTypeDef *hdma)  
{  
  UART_HandleTypeDef *huart = (UART_HandleTypeDef *)((DMA_HandleTypeDef *)hdma)->Parent;  
  
  /* Initialize type of RxEvent that correspond to RxEvent callback execution;  
     In this case, Rx Event type is Half Transfer */
     huart->RxEventType = HAL_UART_RXEVENT_HT;  
  
  /* Check current reception Mode :  
     If Reception till IDLE event has been selected : use Rx Event callback */  if (huart->ReceptionType == HAL_UART_RECEPTION_TOIDLE)  
  {  
#if (USE_HAL_UART_REGISTER_CALLBACKS == 1)  
    /*Call registered Rx Event callback*/  
    huart->RxEventCallback(huart, huart->RxXferSize / 2U);  
#else  
    /*Call legacy weak Rx Event callback*/  
    HAL_UARTEx_RxEventCallback(huart, huart->RxXferSize / 2U);  
#endif /* USE_HAL_UART_REGISTER_CALLBACKS */  
  }  
  else  
  {  
    /* In other cases : use Rx Half Complete callback */  
#if (USE_HAL_UART_REGISTER_CALLBACKS == 1)  
    /*Call registered Rx Half complete callback*/  
    huart->RxHalfCpltCallback(huart);  
#else  
    /*Call legacy weak Rx Half complete callback*/  
    HAL_UART_RxHalfCpltCallback(huart);  
#endif /* USE_HAL_UART_REGISTER_CALLBACKS */  
  }  
}

void UART_InitDMAReceive() {

//è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„DMAç©ºé—²ä¸­æ–­å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
void UART_DMAIdleCallback(UART_HandleTypeDef *huart) {  
    if (huart == &huart1 ) {  
        __HAL_DMA_DISABLE(huart->hdmarx);//å¤±èƒ½DMA
        int datalen = rxBufferLen - __HAL_DMA_GET_COUNTER(huart->hdmarx);  
        for(int i=0;i<datalen;i++) {  
            char temp = rxBuffer[i];  
            txBuffer[i] = (temp >= 'a' && temp <= 'z') ? temp-32:temp;
        }  
        HAL_UART_Transmit_DMA(&huart1,(uint8_t*)txBuffer,datalen);  
        __HAL_DMA_SET_COUNTERT(huart->hdmarx,rxBufferLen);//é‡ç½®DMAè®¡æ•°
        __HAL_DMA_ENABLE(huart->hdmarx);//ä½¿èƒ½DMA 
    }  
  
}

    if (__HAL_UART_GET_FLAG(&huart1 , UART_FLAG_IDLE) != RESET ) {//åœ¨æ­¤åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºé—²ä¸­æ–­
        __HAL_UART_CLEAR_IDLEFLAG(&huart1);//æ¸…é™¤ç©ºé—²ä¸­æ–­æ ‡å¿—ä½
        __HAL_UART_DISABLE_IT(&huart1, UART_IT_IDLE);//å¤±èƒ½ç©ºé—²ä¸­æ–­
        UART_DMAIdleCallback(&huart1);//è°ƒç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¸­æ–­å›è°ƒå‡½æ•° 
        __HAL_UART_ENABLE_IT(&huart1, UART_IT_IDLE);//ä½¿èƒ½ç©ºé—²ä¸­æ–­  
    }  
  
  /* USER CODE END USART1_IRQn 1 */  
}

HAL_StatusTypeDef HAL_UART_DMAStop(UART_HandleTypeDef *huart)  
{  
  uint32_t dmarequest = 0x00U;  
  /* The Lock is not implemented on this API to allow the user application  
     to call the HAL UART API under callbacks HAL_UART_TxCpltCallback() / HAL_UART_RxCpltCallback():     when calling HAL_DMA_Abort() API the DMA TX/RX Transfer complete interrupt is generated     and the correspond call back is executed HAL_UART_TxCpltCallback() / HAL_UART_RxCpltCallback()     */  
  /* Stop UART DMA Tx request if ongoing */  
  dmarequest = HAL_IS_BIT_SET(huart->Instance->CR3, USART_CR3_DMAT);  
  if ((huart->gState == HAL_UART_STATE_BUSY_TX) && dmarequest)  
  {  
    ATOMIC_CLEAR_BIT(huart->Instance->CR3, USART_CR3_DMAT);  
  
    /* Abort the UART DMA Tx channel */  
    if (huart->hdmatx != NULL)  
    {  
      HAL_DMA_Abort(huart->hdmatx);  
    }  
    UART_EndTxTransfer(huart);  
  }  
  
  /* Stop UART DMA Rx request if ongoing */  
  dmarequest = HAL_IS_BIT_SET(huart->Instance->CR3, USART_CR3_DMAR);  
  if ((huart->RxState == HAL_UART_STATE_BUSY_RX) && dmarequest)  
  {  
    ATOMIC_CLEAR_BIT(huart->Instance->CR3, USART_CR3_DMAR);  
  
    /* Abort the UART DMA Rx channel */  
    if (huart->hdmarx != NULL)  
    {  
      HAL_DMA_Abort(huart->hdmarx);  
    }  
    UART_EndRxTransfer(huart);  
  }  
  return HAL_OK;  
}

HAL_StatusTypeDef HAL_UARTEx_ReceiveToIdle_DMA(UART_HandleTypeDef *huart, uint8_t *pData, uint16_t Size)  
{  
  HAL_StatusTypeDef status;  
  
  /* Check that a Rx process is not already ongoing */  
  if (huart->RxState == HAL_UART_STATE_READY)  
  {  
    if ((pData == NULL) || (Size == 0U))  
    {  
      return HAL_ERROR;  
    }  
  
    /* Set Reception type to reception till IDLE Event*/  
    huart->ReceptionType = HAL_UART_RECEPTION_TOIDLE;  
    huart->RxEventType = HAL_UART_RXEVENT_TC;  
  
    status =  UART_Start_Receive_DMA(huart, pData, Size);  
  
    /* Check Rx process has been successfully started */  
    if (huart->ReceptionType == HAL_UART_RECEPTION_TOIDLE)  
    {  
      __HAL_UART_CLEAR_IDLEFLAG(huart);  
      ATOMIC_SET_BIT(huart->Instance->CR1, USART_CR1_IDLEIE);  
    }  
    else  
    {  
      /* In case of errors already pending when reception is started,  
         Interrupts may have already been raised and lead to reception abortion.         (Overrun error for instance).         In such case Reception Type has been reset to HAL_UART_RECEPTION_STANDARD. */      status = HAL_ERROR;  
    }  
    return status;  
  }  
  else  
  {  
    return HAL_BUSY;  
  }  
}

item.description:

åœ¨å‡½æ•°å†…éƒ¨å®šä¹‰çš„å˜é‡ï¼Œå½“ç¨‹åºæ‰§è¡Œåˆ°å…¶å®šä¹‰å¤„æ—¶æ²¡ç¼–è¯‘å™¨ä¼šä¸ºå®ƒåœ¨æ ˆä¸Šåˆ†é…ç©ºé—´ï¼Œå‡½æ•°åœ¨æ ˆä¸Šåˆ†é…çš„ç©ºé—´å†æ¬¡å‡½æ•°ç»“æŸæ—¶ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾æ‰
